articles.author: YURI KAGEYAMA AP Business Writer
articles.title: Fugitive Ghosn brings global attention to Japanese justice
articles.description: Though former Nissan Chairman Ghosn is unlikely to stand trial in a real court, he has made himself a key witness in putting Japan's justice system on trial
articles.content:
TOKYO -- 
Though former Nissan Chairman Ghosn is unlikely to stand trial in a real court, he has made himself a key witness in putting Japan's justice system on trial. 
In his first public appearance after fleeing to Lebanon, Ghosn lambasted unfair detentio… [+6399 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: China's economy czar going to Washington to sign trade deal
articles.description: China's government says its economy czar will go to Washington next week for the signing of an interim trade deal
articles.content:
BEIJING -- 
Chinas economy czar will visit Washington next week for the signing of an interim trade deal, the government said Thursday.
Vice Premier Liu He, Beijings chief envoy in talks with Washington over their tariff war, had been expected to attend the… [+1974 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Report: Road accident in Iran kills 19 people, injures 24
articles.description: An Iranian news agency says 19 people were killed and 24 were injured in a road accident in the country's north
articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran -- 
A bus plunged into a ravine in northern Iran early on Thursday morning, killing 19 people and injuring 24, the semi-official ISNA news agency reported.
According to the report, the accident happened in the northern province of Mazandaran. T… [+394 chars]

articles.author: Jake Coyle AP Film Writer
articles.title: Pitt, Sandler and 'The Irishman' celebrated at NBR Awards
articles.description: The National Board of Review has toasted Martin Scorsese’s “The Irishman” as the year’s best film in an awards ceremony Wednesday night
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- 
The National Board of Review toasted Martin Scorseses The Irishman as the years best film in an awards ceremony Wednesday night that included Brad Pitt crediting Bradley Cooper for his sobriety, Timothee Chalamet extolling the virtues of the Saf… [+4255 chars]

articles.author: ANDREW SELSKY Associated Press
articles.title: Facebook riles tiny Oregon town with plan for undersea cable
articles.description: A tiny coastal village in Oregon is opposing a plan by Facebook to build a landing spot for a submarine cable connecting America with Asia
articles.content:
TIERRA DEL MAR, Ore. -- 
A battle playing out in a tiny Oregon town with no stoplights or cellphone service is pitting residents against one of the world's biggest tech companies.
Locals in coastal Tierra del Mar are trying to stop Facebook from using prope… [+5538 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Iran investigators: Crashed jetliner never called for help
articles.description: Iran investigators say crew of Ukrainian jetliner that crashed never made a radio call for help and were trying to turn back to the airport when the plane went down
articles.content:
TEHRAN, Iran -- 
Iran investigators say crew of Ukrainian jetliner that crashed never made a radio call for help and were trying to turn back to the airport when the plane went down.
